answerText: Plasmodium[10] Plasmodium carried by the Anopheles mosquitoes can cause this disease, to which people heterozygous for sickle cell anemia are more resistant.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 9 | 13 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This genus of apicomplexans can reproduce by schizogony, or multiple fission. For 10 points each: [10] Name this genus that includes the species draconis, falciparum and vivax.
